archimate:Capability.name: Case Management
archimate:Capability.documentation: The ability to define, research, assess, recommend a plan of action for, act on, report on, resolve within a defined timeframe, or otherwise address an instance of a situation or condition associated with a constituent, that is related to legal, social, healthcare, or related government services.

properties.value: The ability to define, research, assess, recommend a plan of action for, act on, report on, resolve within a defined timeframe, or otherwise address an instance of a situation or condition associated with a constituent, that is related to legal, social, healthcare, or related government services.
